schema_version.description: Version of the transformation data format schema

fixed_volume.description: Path or identifier of the fixed volume to which this volume is registered

transformation_matrix.description: 3x4 affine transformation matrix in XYZ coordinate order (homogeneous coordinate row omitted). First 3x3 is the rotation matrix, last column is the translation vector. Applied as p_fixed = M @ p_moving after the homogeneous row is added to the matrix.

fixed_landmarks.description: Array of (x, y, z) points in the fixed volume (voxel coordinates)

moving_landmarks.description: Corresponding (x, y, z) points in the moving volume (voxel coordinates)
